name: Natan Gamedze
description:
How is this for a movie plot?

An African prince from... let's say, Zamunda (sounds real enough) has had enough of his royal life. So he moves to... let's say, New York (sounds believable enough), where he gets the job as... let's say, a janitor (gotta start somewhere), and then...

Wait, that's been done? Eddie Murphy, "Coming to America"? You don't say! OK, what about...

An African prince from... let's say, Swaziland (sounds real enough) has had enough of his royal life. So he moves to... let's say, Israel (sounds believable enough), where he gets the job as... let's say, a rabbi (gotta start somewhere), and then...

Wait, that's been done? Natan Gamedze, in real life? You don't say!
